name: Base Description
prompt: A video of streetview, realistic, high quality, 4k.

name: Weather: Rainy
prompt: A video of streetview in heavy rain, wet ground, cinematic lighting.

name: Style: Cartoon
prompt: A video of streetview in cartoon style, anime aesthetics, vibrant colors.

name: Material: Lego
prompt: A video of streetview made of lego blocks, plastic texture, toy world.

name: Env: Mars Red Planet
prompt: A video of streetview on Mars, red dust storm, alien sky, rusty buildings, sci-fi rover view.
negative_prompt: blue sky, green trees, grass, ocean, rain.

name: Abstract: Thermal Vision
prompt: A video of streetview through a thermal imaging camera, heat map colors (blue, purple, red, yellow), night vision.
